snippet: Politicians from across the political spectrum filled the sanctuary Monday morning at Edward I. Koch’s funeral at Temple Emanu-El in Manhattan.
abstract: Politicians from across the political spectrum fill Temple Emanu-El in Manhattan for funeral services of former Mayor Edward I Koch; Gov Andrew M Cuomo, Mayor Michael R Bloomberg and former Pres Bill Clinton are among those delivering eulogies as Koch's bond with city is celebrated.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael Barbaro, Sam Roberts, Marc Santora and Kate Taylor.

lead_paragraph: Politicians from across the political spectrum filled the sanctuary Monday morning at Edward I. Koch’s funeral at Temple Emanu-El in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Thousands Gather to Celebrate Former Mayor Ed Koch
headline.main: In Words and Unmistakable Song, Koch’s Bond With City Is Celebrated
headline.print_headline: In Words and Unmistakable Song, Koch’s Bond With City Is Celebrated
